overview: From Girlfriends Films comes Lesbian Sorority House, a 2+ hour-long movie showcasing what horny coeds are up to after class ends for the day. The sorority house is composed of a variety of beautiful girls, including Lily Love, Veruca James, Abigail Mac, Claire Robbins, Alina Li, Belle Noire, Karla Kush, and Karmen Karma. For the girls of Thornhill University's top sorority house, the collegiate experience extends way past the classroom. Whether initiating pledges to the Greek system or preparing for a formal dance, the sorority girls follow one rule: sisters always come first. This includes in the bedroom, where these horny lesbians are always looking to score the highest marks. Frisky lesbians have after class fun at the sorority house!
tagline: Girls just want to have fun at the sorority house!
title: Lesbian Sorority House
